title: The Lemonade stand: what's fair?
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Thomas Smith
brief_description: Uses the illustration of two boys who open a lemonade stand in order to present a study of the meaning of commitment, obligations, and responsibility to others. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
